name: Bane of the Trapped
flavorText: Lady Tu de Qing commissioned this gem from the workshops of Xiansai, saying "I prefer my targets asleep or drunk. Barring that, I'll take sluggish."
flavorTextHtml: Lady Tu de Qing commissioned this gem from the workshops of Xiansai, saying "I prefer my targets asleep or drunk. Barring that, I'll take sluggish."

secondary.textHtml: Increase damage against enemies under the effects of control-impairing effects by 15.00%. 15.00%
secondary.text: Increase damage against enemies under the effects of control-impairing effects by 15.00%. 15.00%
